item.title: 【Helpdesk】[SOFTWARE] m3u8-to-mkv (linux/macos shell script to download m3u8 videos in mkv)
item.description:
Hey guys! I made this script with bard that lets you to download m3u8 videos and convert them into mkv, all with ffmpeg. The reason I've made it was because when I tried ripping the vmas 2023 from mtv's website, the regular method I used for downloading videos (XDM) wasn't working, so, after messing around a little bit I've finally found the way to rip it. I decided to make this into an automated script so I could download videos from (almost) any website with ease. It does not only work with m3u8 streams, but with any video file hosted in the internet (mp4, webm...).

This script only works on linux and macos (it should), I also have a windows version of this script but I currently don't have access to it. Anyways, Enjoy
